EmailTemplate.description: Remove Member Request, Message for Channel Partner when Member Request is Completed
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Request: Remove member request completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Remove Member Request Completed for:{!Partner_Request__c.Team_Member_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Your request to offboard {!Partner_Request__c.Team_Member_Name__c} was completed. Click here {!Partner_Request__c.Link} to view the details of your request.
Thank you.
